title: Young Love
description: A sad, sweet YA novel about love.Young Love discovers the power of dreams and love. As a child, Sliver is visited by an angel with a message of death and true love. When Silver meets Tucker, she finally finds her match, her true love. The more she falls for Tuck, the more time she wishes she had. Will the angel grant her time, or is a young death sealed.
author: Q.S. Fulton
